relation: There is always security that are walking around campus to make sure students and staffs are safe.
Sitting in campus and enjoy the learning environment around us will make you feel more productive.
Cafeteria are not big but there is always food for students and staff to enjoy.
I am not sure about dorm life becasue i travel from home every day.
Classes are very fun for most subject.
Just try your best for all classes. There might be some subject that you dont like but always give the best effort and you might learn something that you never know.
QCC is a great community for learning. Its quite but not too far from city. Most staff are very polite and are willing to help students with their diffculties.
pageTitle: CUNY Queensborough Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
textBeforeTable: 07/01/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has not been to campus. 2 out of 3 people found this review useful. 1 of 32 Camille from East Elmhurst, NY Check out reviews left by other students or leave your own review. textAfterTable: Will learn a lot I feel I will learn alot because my sisters go there and they are getting what they need. Login to rate or flag the reviews Tiana from Bronx, NY 11/20/2010 Reviewer is Researching this school. Reviewer has not been to campus. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 32 Categories Comments Great for these types of students If you want to do business, nursing , computers plus more this would be a go school to start off with Tips for prospective students Don't be to quick to no look and explore any school even community colleges. Just because you want to go to a university doesn't mean you going to get a better education. You can get the same education in the same field in a community college. Plus it wont coast you that much. Will enjoy being here Yes i
